'''<s> Tetsuo do Akira </s> K9999'''', conhecido como "Ká fórnái" no [[Brasil]], é um personagem do [[The King of Fighters|têquingue]] e para variar, seu nome começa com K, assim como [[Kensou]], [[Kasumi Todo|Kasumi]], [[Kim Kaphwan|Kim]], [[Krizalid]], [[Kula]], [[Kyo]], [[Krauser]], [[K']] ou [[King (Art of Fighting)|King]]. Logo, ele é mais um clone do Kyo

== K9999 ==

K9999, mais conhecido no Brasil como K9 ou K99 por questões de abreviação (pronuncia-se "kay four nine" em inglês), é um personagem da série de videogame The King of Fighters, realizada pela empresa fabricante de videogames SNK Playmore. Suas principais característica é ser um dos vilões da Saga Nests, a segunda saga da série The King of Fighters e ser uma copia defeituosa da copia perfeita do kyo que é o k'.
K9999 é um clone criado pelo Cartel Nests que tem a missão de eliminar todos os clones imperfeitos, como K' e Kula Diamond.
Numa série com tanto personagem ruim, K9999 conseguiu a façanha de ser o primeiro personagem REJEITADO pela SNK pelo plágio descarado do Tetsuo do Akira; o cara foi simplesmente LIMADO, EXCLUÍDO, ESCORRAÇADO da história da série, e substituído pelo outro mané abaixo.

== Nameless ==
[[Arquivo:Namelesse.jpg|thumb|left|Os dois imbecis lutando pra decidir quem vai ficar na história do jogo.]]
Nameless é o novo <s>viadinho</s> K9999 feita pela SNK, como novo sprites piorados(ela se livrou do K9999 porque foi processada por plágio e por isso faliu)
A historia de Nameless é a historia mais melosa , dramática e [[emo]] tudo começa em um belo dia de Sol e [[gay|arco-iris]] na casinha do <s>ninho</s> [[Microsoft]], Nameless um garotinho da pesada que foi criado com o [[gozo]] que foi robado de K' e Kyo enquanto eles batiam uma [[Punheta]] (daí o cabelo escroto metade branco, metade <s>preto</s> <s>roxo</s> castanho).
Nameless passou por uma série de sacrifícios como : pintar arco-iris , plantar flores e olhar a G Magazine (que ele adorava), no meio de um teste que era para fazer um [[pênis]] com as chamas Cúsanagis ele se deparou com uma emuxa que estava chorando no meio do corredor,então ele ficou todo alegrinho e chorou junto com ela até que [[Igniz]](pensei que estava morto) o mandou para lutar no torneio da K.O.F , desde então ele tenta transar com ela.

== Trívia ==
* K9999 é <s>um plágio</s> homenagem da [[SNK Playmore]] ao personagem ''Tetsuo Shima'', do [[anime]] ''[[Akira]]''. Ambos possuem aparência e poderes quase idênticos e a voz do mesmo [[narrador]] [[Japão|japonês]]: ''Nozomu Sasaki''.
Ele usa sua mão apelona para trucidar fanboys de Athena, e emos que adoram Ash Crimson!
